name: Q*Bert The Remake
description:
Q*Bert, a successful arcade game from the 80s, comes back today in three dimensions including three levels with distinct features. 

Available now, time to re-live the adventure!

Q*Bert : the Remake is a 3D platformer game composed of three unique levels. In this game, you have to color the cubes as quickly as possible while avoiding your enemies. Practice as much as you can to beat your high score and become the fastest Q*Bert of this world.

Controls :

          Movement

                    Camera Movement

             Pause

Q-Bert : the Remake is a school project made by team Q-te, a freshmen team from E-Artsup Montpellier, France.

Instructions: produce an arcade game remake in 10 weeks.  

Game Choosen: Q-Bert

Team Goals: In pre-production, we decided to fix us 4 objectives:

  • Make a playable game for keyboard/mouse players (those who knew the original game can easily guess why this was a goal).
  • Create new worlds and break the routine of the repetitive pyramids from the original game.
  • Produce a game for young and old alike, in a familial way.
  • Make Q-Bert a charming character, more than a cute one.

For this student project, we use some free assets and music. Thanks to these people for their work which is so useful for students like us !

Here are the credits, please feel free to go and listen to / look at their work !

Musics

Maya Level : Jungle Awakening – Rune Dale 

Glow Cave Level : In the Deep Dark Blue – Cleo Wright

Islands Level : Island to Island – Adriel Fair 

Menus : Come Quickly – Spectacles Wallet and Watch

Credits & Trailer :  Dance to My Tune – Marc Torch

 

Assets

Ocean of Islands Level  : LowPoly Water – Ebru Dogan

Input Icon   : Wasd Keys – Zack Bogart

Pause lcon  : Pause – Amantaka

Mouse Icon  : Mouse – Icon Lauk / Arrow – Masmooh


Team Q-te is composed of :

Jennifer : Junior Graphic Designer (2D / 3D) -- Trailer creator

Antoine : Junior Programmer

Cynthia : Junior Programmer -- Product Owner 

Eric : Junior Graphic Designer (2D / 3D) -- Lead Graphic Designer
